mapper.select: select id, name, create_date from member
select num, id, password, name, gender, birth, worker_code workerCode, power_code powerCode, createdate createDate, withdrawal from users where id = #{id}
select num, id, password, name, gender, birth, worker_code workerCode, power_code powerCode, createdate createDate, withdrawal from users where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into users (id, password, name, birth, gender) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender})
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, where id = #{id}
update member set password = #{password}, where id = #{id}
